additions.title: Common Swimming Pool
additions.description: A shared pool for guests to cool off and gather, potentially near the palm grove.

additions.title: Prefab Accommodation Cabins
additions.description: High-quality prefabricated guest rooms with minimal environmental footprint.
cons: Can feel generic if not styled well

additions.title: Cave Cabins (Mountain Cut)
additions.description: Guest suites carved into the sandstone for ultimate seclusion and mystique.

additions.title: Restaurant Pavilion
additions.description: A small onsite dining experience serving local and wellness-focused cuisine.

additions.title: Desert Café / Lookout Lounge
additions.description: A simple café at a high point or edge to enjoy coffee and views.
pros: Lower setup cost than full restaurant

additions.title: Wellness Deck / Outdoor Yoga Platform
additions.description: A dedicated zone for yoga, meditation, or silent reflection.

additions.title: Lighting Pathways
additions.description: Discreet lighting along key walking routes.

additions.title: Spa
additions.description: A tranquil space offering massage, hammam, or holistic treatments tailored to the desert environment.

additions.title: Lounge
additions.description: A shaded indoor-outdoor space for socializing, reading, and relaxing.
pros: Can double as reception or cultural point

additions.title: Observatory
additions.description: An open-sky or telescope-equipped observatory for desert stargazing experiences.

additions.title: Camel Rides
additions.description: Offer short or scenic camel rides for cultural immersion and slow exploration.

additions.title: Swing or Hammock Spots
additions.description: Strategic placement of swings or hammocks for relaxation and photo moments.

additions.title: Handicraft Learning Space
additions.description: A place where guests can learn or observe local craft traditions like weaving or pottery.

additions.title: Outdoor Theater
additions.description: A terraced or open-floor seating area for outdoor talks, screenings, or performances.
cons: Limited use in wind or heat

additions.title: Bedouin Tent Experience
additions.description: A traditional-style tent setup for dining, storytelling, or hosted gatherings.
pros: Flexible use for groups or evenings
cons: Can be overdone if not genuine
